## Overview
This section contains a collection of machine learning labs implemented in **R**, using datasets commonly explored in coursework and practical applications.

Each lab focuses on a specific method or concept, including:

- Linear regression
- Support Vector Machines (SVM)


The goal of these labs is to demonstrate mastery of ML workflows using reproducible Quarto documents.
